edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class StudySpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.StudySpace

  • public class StudySpace
extends java.lang.Object
    Study space is the core of WISE system -- represents the core abstractions for individual survey projects.

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String msgId)
        Returns the User object linked with the message ID.
        Parameters:
        msgId - Message Id from the URL whose user object is to be initialized. *
        Returns:
        User Newly created User Object from the provided message ID.

      • sendInviteReturnDisplayMessage

        public java.lang.String sendInviteReturnDisplayMessage(java.lang.String msg_type,
                                              java.lang.String message_seq_id,
                                              java.lang.String survey_id,
                                              java.lang.String whereStr,
                                              boolean isReminder)
        Method that calls the private send method to send emails to users.
        Parameters:
        msgType - Type of the message that has to be sent as email (The message type can be invite/interrupt/done/review/others)
        messageSeqId - The ID of the message sequence which as to be emailed. This Id is the one given in the preface.xml
        surveyId - The survey ID for which this message sequence is linked to and this should be same as the value in preface.xml
        whereStr - The sql whereStr which is used to get the details of the person to whom the email has to be sent from the invitee table.
        isReminder - If the message is a reminder or not.
        displayMessage - This is used to send the message back as output for the case of anonymous users
        Returns:
        String output message or message use ID for the invitee to whom email is sent.

      • sendInviteReturnMsgSeqId

        public java.lang.String sendInviteReturnMsgSeqId(java.lang.String msg_type,
                                        java.lang.String message_seq_id,
                                        java.lang.String survey_id,
                                        java.lang.String whereStr,
                                        boolean isReminder)
        Method that calls the private send method to send emails to users.
        Parameters:
        msgType - Type of the message that has to be sent as email (The message type can be invite/interrupt/done/review/others)
        messageSeqId - The ID of the message sequence which as to be emailed. This Id is the one given in the preface.xml
        surveyId - The survey ID for which this message sequence is linked to and this should be same as the value in preface.xml
        whereStr - The sql whereStr which is used to get the details of the person to whom the email has to be sent from the invitee table.
        isReminder - If the message is a reminder or not.
        displayMessage - This is used to send the message back as output for the case of anonymous users
        Returns:
        String output message or message use ID for the invitee to whom email is sent.
